Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI is always available whereas teachers may not always be, additionally some teachers are not very nice and are unhelpful while GenAI you can prompt it until you get the right understanding

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI is always supportive, teachers can be dismissive arrogant or look down on you for asking

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI can be wrong. Teachers are majority correct unless it is outside their expertise.
